title: November 2025 Bouldering Session
description: Completed this V2, I would say it's fun. The crux is on the finishing move, because you're already tired from all the previous moves and need to deadpoint to the top hold.
highlights: Read the route well before starting
Reached the top hold with a deadpoint

media.caption: The starting beta for the V2 route

title: December 2025 Bouldering Session
description: Leg flexibility and tricep strength was needed to start because there was no footholds for the starting move. After that, we need to traverse rightwards, before making a big move to the top hold using deadpoint, which is kind of scary because it looks far away to reach and your feet could slip off if you don't flag properly.
highlights: Got encouragement from strangers while climbing
Switched feet smoothly on the traverse
Flagged well to stabilize while reaching the top hold
